text: Timiharumadhye jasale aphna striharusanga jihara garihalchan (arthata uniharula'i ama bhanihalchan) tiniharu uniharuka vastavika ama bha'ihaldainan. Uniharuka ama ta ti nai hun jasako petabata uniharu janmeka chan. Niscaya nai uniharu e'uta anucita ra asatya kura bhandachan (ra) allaha bado daya garnevala ra ksamasila cha
